special_text:
[+1]: Each player discards a card and loses 2 life. If you control a Soldier or discarded a Soldier card, draw a card.
[0]: You get an emblem with “Soldiers you control get +1/+1.” If you control three or more Soldiers, put a lifelink or deathtouch counter on a creature you control.
[-2]: Put a Soldier card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
